persephone 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Plotting with persephone

Define a hierarchical time series

Source: R/hierarchicalTimeSeries.R
hierarchicalTimeSeries.Rd

Combine mutliple objects of persephone objects into a new persephone object. The resulting time series can perform direct and indirect adjustments.

hierarchicalTimeSeries

Format

An object of class R6ClassGenerator of length 24.

Inherits

persephone

Constructor

hierarchicalTimeSeries$new(...)

  • ... should contain one or more persephone objects that use the same time instances. All lements supplied here must be named.

  • model specifies a model to be used. tramoseats or x13

  • userdefined is passed as the userdefined argument to tramoseats or x13

  • spec a model specification returned by x13_spec() or tramoseats_spec()

Examples

obj_x13 <- x13Single$new(AirPassengers, "RSA3")

ht <- hierarchicalTimeSeries$new(a = obj_x13, b = obj_x13)
ht$run()
ht$adjusted

ht2$run()
